titles.title: 239 This Is My Wonderful Story (nice tune)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is my
Wonderful story
Christ to my heart has come
Jesus the King of Glory
Finds in my heart a home

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Christ in me
Christ in me
Christ in me
O wonderful story

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Was there e'er
Story so moving
Story of love and pain
Was there e'er
Bridegroom so loving
Seeking our hearts to gain

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I am so glad
I recieved Him
Jesus my heart's dear King
I who so often have grieved Him
All to His feet would bring

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
How can I ever be lonely
How can I ever fall
What can I want if only
Christ is my all in all

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Now in His bosom confiding
This my glad song shall be
I am in Jesus abiding
Jesus abides in me
